name: FPS Game Demo
description:
This is a short FPS game demo that was made using Unity's "FPS Microgame' tutorial. Working on this was my first time using Unity, so I wanted to start out with something easy. 

Thank you to everyone who downloaded this game demo; feel free to write down your thoughts on the demo in the comments below. Thanks :)

I will update this demo, either with new levels or I will just make level 1 not so easy ;)
